backup-keys-descr: In Habla, you use keys to access your account. You are the master of your kingdom, best to keep them safe! üëë
fill-profile-descr: Let others know about yourself so people can have a reason to follow you. You don‚Äôt have to share everything, just the parts you‚Äôre comfortable with üòå
add-relays-descr: Relays are servers that help you discover content and publish to them.
discover-zaps-descr: Zaps are payments based on the bitcoin‚Äôs lightning protocol. They are totally optional, but make things a bit more fun! You can send and receive payments with one tap with zaps enabled ü§Ø
public-key-descr: Your public key is like a username, allows others to find and follow your activity.
private-key-descr: Your private key is like a password, allows you to post from your account. Please keep your private key in a safe place.
private-key-more: We recommend using key manager extensions for accessing your Nostr accounts securely.
